description:
Mortefi, a skilled expert in Applied Tacetite Study and a member of the Academy’s Department of Safety, possesses the unique ability to transform his accumulated frustration into fiery flames.
From a burning wrath that consumes all, the red dragon shall descend.

descriptionLocalized.vi: Mortefi, một chuyên gia lão luyện trong nghiên cứu Tacetite Ứng dụng và là thành viên của Khoa An toàn của Viện Hàn lâm, sở hữu khả năng độc đáo biến đổi sự thất vọng tích tụ của mình thành ngọn lửa rực cháy.Từ cơn thịnh nộ bốc cháy nuốt chửng tất cả, con rồng đỏ sẽ giáng xuống.
descriptionLocalized.id: Mortefi, seorang ahli terampil dalam Studi Tacetite Terapan dan anggota Departemen Keamanan Akademi, memiliki kemampuan unik untuk mengubah frustrasinya yang terakumulasi menjadi api yang menyala-nyala.Dari amukan api yang membakar segalanya, naga merah akan turun.
descriptionLocalized.th: Mortefi, ผู้เชี่ยวชาญด้านการประยุกต์ใช้ Tacite ในระดับสูง และเป็นสมาชิกของแผนกความปลอดภัยของสถาบัน มีความสามารถพิเศษในการเปลี่ยนความหงุดหงิดที่สะสมไว้ให้กลายเป็นเปลวไฟจากโทสะที่ลุกโชนและเผาผลาญทุกสิ่ง มังกรแดงจะลงมา

quote: Fine, since you've done this much for me... Go ahead, tell me the wildest inventions you can think of, and watch me make them happen for you.

quoteLocalized.vi: Được rồi, vì bạn đã làm được nhiều như vậy cho tôi... Hãy tiếp tục, kể cho tôi nghe những ý tưởng hoang dã nhất mà bạn có thể nghĩ ra, và xem tôi sẽ biến chúng thành hiện thực cho bạn.
quoteLocalized.th: Baiklah, karena kau sudah melakukan semua ini untukku... Lanjutkan, katakan padaku penemuan paling liar yang bisa kau pikirkan, dan saksikan aku mewujudkannya untukmu.
quoteLocalized.id: Baiklah, karena kamu sudah melakukan ini untukku... Silahkan, katakan padaku penemuan terliar yang dapat kamu pikirkan, dan saksikan aku mewujudkannya untukmu.

resonanceChain.name: Solitary Etude
resonanceChain.description: During Resonance Liberation Burning Rhapsody, Mortefi launches Coordinated Attacks when the on-field character performs their Resonance Skills, firing {0} Resonance Liberation's Marcato hits, dealing Fusion Damage.

resonanceChain.name: Hypocritical Hymn
resonanceChain.description: After using the Echo Skill, Mortefi restores an additional {0} Resonance Energy. This can be triggered once every {1} second.

resonanceChain.name: Flaming Recitativo
resonanceChain.description: During Resonance Liberation Burning Rhapsody, the Crit. DMG of Resonance Liberation's Marcato is increased by {0}.

resonanceChain.name: Cathartic Waltz
resonanceChain.description: The duration of Resonance Liberation Burning Rhapsody is extended by {0}s.

resonanceChain.name: Funerary Quartet
resonanceChain.description: When Resonance Skill Passionate Variation or Resonance Skill Fury Fugue hits a target, {0} Resonance Liberation's Marcato hits will be fired, dealing Fusion Damage. DMG of Resonance Liberation's Marcato fired in this way is reduced by {1}.

resonanceChain.name: Apoplectic Instrumental
resonanceChain.description: When Resonance Liberation Violent Finale is cast, ATK of all team members is increased by {0} for {1}s.

skills.name: Impromptu Show
skills.description: Basic Attack Mortefi uses his dual pistols and flames to perform up to 4 consecutive shots, dealing Fusion DMG. Heavy Attack Mortefi enters the aiming state for a more powerful shot. The aimed shot fired after charging finishes deals Fusion DMG. Mid-air Attack Mortefi consumes Stamina to perform consecutive shots at the target in mid-air, dealing Fusion DMG. Dodge Counter Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Fusion DMG.

skills.name: Passionate Variation
skills.description: Launch a flashing lightning of flames forward, dealing Fusion DMG.

skills.name: Violent Finale
skills.description: Deal Fusion DMG, and apply Burning Rhapsody to all characters in the team. Burning Rhapsody When the on-field character's Basic Attack hits the target, Mortefi launches a Coordinated Attack, firing 1 Marcato. When the on-field character's Heavy Attack hits the target, Mortefi launches a Coordinated Attack, firing 2 Marcato. Mortefi can launch one Coordinated Attack every 0.35s. Marcato Deals Fusion DMG.

skills.name: Harmonic Control
skills.description: After casting Resonance Skill Passionate Variation, the damage of Resonance Skill Fury Fugue is increased by 25% for 8s.

skills.name: Rhythmic Vibrato
skills.description: During Resonance Liberation Burning Rhapsody, each hit of Resonance Liberation Marcato will increase the damage of the next Resonance Liberation Marcato by 1.5%, which can be triggered once every 0.35s, stacking up to 50 times. The effect will be reset after Resonance Liberation Burning Rhapsody ends.

skills.name: Dissonance
skills.description: Attack the target, dealing Fusion DMG.

skills.name: Fury Fugue
skills.description: Resonance Skill: Fury Fugue When Mortefi's "Annoyance" reaches 100, his Resonance Skill is replaced with Fury Fudge. When casting Fury Fudge, Mortefi consumes all "Annoyance" to unleash high-speed flame lightning, dealing Fusion DMG, considered as Resonance Skill damage. Annoyance Mortefi can hold up to 100 Annoyance. When Normal Attack Impromptu Show hits the target, “Annoyance” is restored. When Intro Skill Dissonance hits the target, “Annoyance” is restored. When Resonance Skill Passionate Variation hits the target, “Annoyance” is restored. Within 5s after casting Passionate Variation, Basic Attack Impromptu that hits the target additionally restores “Annoyance”.

skills.name: Skillful Cooking
skills.description: Has a chance to produce special dishes when cooking
